bibl.title: The Reign of Cleopatra. (Greenwood Guides to Historic Events of the Ancient World.)
bibl.note: A pbk version has been published by: Norman, OK, University of Oklahoma Press, 2007, 8°, xv-180 pp., 2 cartes et 10 pll. ISBN 978-0-8061-3871-8. $16.95. - Preface. - Chronology of Events. - Chapter 1. Historical Background. - Chapter 2. Cleopatra's Life. - Chapter 3. Ptolemaic Egypt: How Did It Work? - Chapter 4. Cleopatra's Egypt: A Multicultural Society.- Chapter 5. Alexandria: City of Culture and Conflict. - Chapter 6. Conclusion: Queen and Symbol. - Biographies: Significant Figures in the Reign of Cleopatra VII. - Primary Documents Concerning Cleopatra VII. - Appendix: The Ptolemies. - Glossary of Selected Terms. Notes. Annotated Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: BURSTEIN Stanley M., The Reign of Cleopatra. (Greenwood Guides to Historic Events of the Ancient World.)
Westport, CT, Greenwood Press, 2004, 8°, 216 pp., cartes, ill. ISBN 978-0-313-32527-4. $46.95.

A pbk version has been published by: Norman, OK, University of Oklahoma Press, 2007, 8°, xv-180 pp., 2 cartes et 10 pll. Cleopatra's Egypt: A Multicultural Society.- Chapter 5. Alexandria: City of Culture and Conflict. - Chapter 6. Conclusion: Queen and Symbol. - Biographies: Significant Figures in the Reign of Cleopatra VII. - Primary Documents Concerning Cleopatra VII. - Appendix: The Ptolemies. - Glossary of Selected Terms.
